******************************************************************* Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Issue Reported: {!Case.Description}
Hello,
Your patience has been truly appreciated. Recently, you were affected by an issue regarding manual orders being placed within the abandoned orders section. A fix has been released.
You can now process manual orders as before. Also, you can now change the status of the orders that went into the abandoned section as a result of this issue. Changing the status will move them back to the appropriate orders area.
Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have further questions. Technical support is available 24/7:
BigCommerce Support http://support.bigcommerce.com
You can reply to this email or to view your case's status you can go here.
